name: Elemental Love (AngryOwl72)
description:
Work Together To Find Your Way To Each Other In Elemental Love!

Use The WASD Keys To Move The Fire Blob, and The Arrow Keys To Move The Ice Cube. The Point Of The Game Is To Get The Two Together.

The Two Characters Can Break Certain Barriers, The Ice Cube Can Break Red Barriers And The Fire Blob Can Break The Aqua Barriers.

There Is A Total Of Six Levels In This Game. My First Game, As Well As Game Jam So Please be Kind :).

Made For The Brackeys Stronger Together Game Jam.

All Music Made By michorvath on freesound.org

And yes I am aware the basic idea is similar to the well known game "Fireboy and Water Girl", however I do not claim for this game to be 100% original.
